categoryQuery: PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT (COUNT(?heritageObject) AS ?numberOfHeritageObjects) ?artPeriod ?name ?description ?startDate ?endDate WHERE { ?heritageObject a schema:VisualArtwork ; schema:temporalCoverage ?artPeriod . ?artPeriod a schema:DefinedTerm ; schema:name ?name ; schema:startDate ?startDate . OPTIONAL { ?artPeriod schema:endDate ?endDate . ?artPeriod schema:description ?description } } ORDER BY ?startDate LIMIT _LIMIT_
itemsQuery: PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/> SELECT * WHERE { { SELECT * WHERE { BIND(<_PERIODID_> AS ?temporalCoverage) ?heritageObject a schema:VisualArtwork ; schema:name ?name ; schema:description ?description ; schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated ; schema:creator ?creator ; schema:temporalCoverage ?temporalCoverage ; schema:image ?image . ?image schema:contentUrl ?imageContentUrl ; schema:license ?imageLicense . OPTIONAL { ?image schema:encodingFormat ?imageEncodingFormat } ?creator <https://schema.org/name> ?creatorName . } ORDER BY ?dateCreated } } LIMIT _LIMIT_ OFFSET _OFFSET_
